taeTakemi.name: Tae Takemi
taeTakemi.location: Tae is always found in her Clinic in the same region of town as your home at Leblanc, but she'll only see you for advancing your relationship in the daytime
taeTakemi.notes: If you want to give Tae a gift, items like a Black Mug or a Cactus are ideal.

ranks.rankOne:
• After 4/18, visit the Clinic near LeBlanc Cafe and talk to her to start this cooperation.
  • Unlocks Rejuvenation, increasing the range of healing items the clinic stocks.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Requires rank 2 (bold) guts.
  • Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "I have a bad heart." +2
    • Choice 2: "I agree." +2
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: "I don't mind." +2 / "I need the medicine." +2
  • Unlocks Sterilization, adding even more items to the clinic shop.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Dr. Takemi will help." +2
    • Choice 2: "You seem happy." +3 / "You're so kind." +2 / "Why free?" +2
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: "That's good." +3 / "When will it be done?" +2
  • Unlocks Immunization, adding support items to the clinic shop.
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: "It suits you." +3 / "You're not honest." +2
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "This is harrassment." +2 / "She's a great doctor." +2
    • Choice 3: "Just rest for today." +2 / "Anything I can do?" +2
    • Choice 4: "We all do sometimes." +3 / "I'm glad you did." +2
  • Unlocks a Discount, reducing the cost of clinic items significantly.
ranks.rankEight:
• Requires rank 4 (charismatic) charm.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "I'm your ally." +2
    • After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Bad Medicine.
  • Complete the Bad Medicine sidequest, then return to Tae:
    • Choice 2: "Let's get to work, doctor." +3 / "It's not over yet." +3 / "You should hurry." +2
    • Choice 3: "It's for you." +3 / "It's for Miwa-chan." +3 / "It's for my exams." +2
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Tae Takemi becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It was rough." +3 / "Don't worry about it." +2 / "It was for my exams." +2
    • Choice 3:
      • Romance - "I wanted to see you"
      • Friendship - "It was for my exams."
    • Choice 4:
      • Romance - "I love you."
      • Friendship - "What do you think?"
    • Choice 5:
      • Romance - "It isn't a joke."
      • Friendship - "That sounds good."
  • Unlocks Inokashira Park, if you haven't already.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Resuscitation, adding more revival-related items to the clinic store.
  • Unlocks the ability to fuse the ultimate Death Persona, Alice.

annTakami.name: Ann Takami
annTakami.location: Ann is found in the Underground Mall in Shibuya after school. She's available in the day on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday, and available day and night on rainy days.
annTakami.notes: Ann likes gifts such as the Powdered Green Tea Set, or the KGB49 Music CD

ranks.rankOne:
• On 4/15 as part of the story your cooperation with Ann will begin. 
  • Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Ann's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Requires rank 2 (considerate) kindness. The date must also be after 5/6.
  • Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "She's so strong." +3 / "Are you feeling better now?" +3 / "So are you friends again?" +2
    • Choice 2: "You might be right." +3 / "You can't blame yourself?" +2 / "Kamoshida had the upper hand." +2
    • Choice 3: "I couldn't just ignore you." +3 / "It was no big deal." +2
  • Unlocks the Girl Talk ability, giving Ann the chance to step in and rescue a failed demon negotiation.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 5: "Can we stop yet?" +3 / "I love you." +2 / "I like you." +2
    • Choice 8: "Has that happened to you?" +3 / "That's odd." +2
    • Choice 9: "The freedom sounds nice?" +2
  • Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Ann the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
  • Unlocks the Inokashira Park location if you've never visited there before.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I know what you mean." +3 / "That comes down to you." +2
    • Choice 2: "That's hilarious." +3 / "That was mean of her." +2
    • Choice 3: "Tell me?" +3 / "I'm afraid to know." +2
    • Choice 4: "Good idea." +3 / "How exactly?" +2
    • Choice 5: "Good luck with that." +3
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Morgana in the bag." +2
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Give it up." +2
    • Choice 2: "She's amazing, huh..." +2
    • Choice 3: "It had grace." +2
  • Unlocks the Crocodile Tears ability, which gives Ann the chance to lower a demon's demands during demon negotiation.
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It seems that way." +3  /  "If it's a friend, yeah." +2
    • Choice 4: "Comfort her." +3 / "Show her your strength." +3 / "Listen to what she has to say." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Motivate" +2 / "Support" +2
  • Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Ann the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "She admires you." +2
    • Choice 4: "Go get 'em, tiger." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Hang on in there." +2
  • Unlocks the Sexy Technique ability, which gives Ann the chance to seduce demons during demon negotiation.
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You have some real guts." +3  /  "You're beautiful as-is." +2
    • Choice 2: All give +3
    • Choice 4: All give +3
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Why don't you ask yourself" +2
  • Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Ann a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Ann Takamaki becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: All give +3
    • Choice 4:
      • Romance - "You have me."
      • Friendship - "You have the others."
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Stay Forever." +3
  • Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Ann the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Ann's Persona to its final form, Ishtar.

ryujiSakamoto.name: Ryuji Sakamoto
ryujiSakamoto.location: • Ryuji is found in your school after school. On days off he'll be found in the arcade if he's available. Her's available in the daytime all week, and day and night on rainy days.

ranks.rankOne:
• On 4/12 as part of the story your cooperation with Ryuji will begin. 
  • All the choices are irrelevant to your rank progression.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Choice 1: "You seem pretty excited." +3 / "I'm counting on you." +3 / "...help with what?" +2
  • Choice 3: Both give +2
  • Phone Call (P5R): All +2
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Let's not fight." +2
    • Choice 2: "Calm down, Ryuji." +3 / "Just endure it." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Naturally angry." +2
  • Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Ryuji the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Are you worried about him?" +3
    • Choice 2: "I know how you feel." +3 / "But you're doing great." +3 / "It's not so bad." +2
    • Choice 2 (P5R): "It's not over, Ryuji." +3 / "Here are my friends" +3
  • Unlocks the Punk Talk ability, giving Ryuji the chance to step in and rescue a failed demon negotiation.
  • Unlocks the Ogikubo Ramen location.
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Protein powder?" +3 / "A towel?" +2 
    • Choice 2: "You seem conflicted." +2 / "Do you want to rejoin?" +2
    • Choice 3: "So he's an asshole?" +3 / "So he's short?." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): Any
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "We can train at my place." +3  /  "Let's stay here." +2 / "How about Protein Lovers?" +2
    • Choice 2: "You guys should trust Nakaoka." +3 / "There is no time for arguing." +3
    • Choice 3: "Absolutely." +3 / "More or less." +3
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Then hit me back." +2
  • Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Ryuji the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Ryuji will text you to initiate this rank naturally. Agree to meet him.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Let's talk to Takeishi." +3
    • Choice 2: "I think it's cool, Ryuji." +3 / "Wait, what?" +2
  • Grants the Insta-kill ability, which gives Ryuji the chance to instantly win a battle after an ambush. Becomes more likely the weaker an enemy is.
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: All give +3
    • Choice 3: "All I did was watch." +3 / "Are you gonna pay me back?" +2
    • Choice 4: All give +3
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Was Kejime attached?" +2
  • Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Ryuji a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
ranks.rankNine:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Are you satisfied now?" +3 / "Not running?" +2
    • Choice 2: "Don't do it." +3 / "What did you say?" +2 / "Do you have any time for that?" +2
    • Choice 3: All give +3
    • Choice 4: "I agree." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Congrats." +2 / "I can't lose." +2
  • Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Ann the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form, Chi You.

makotoNiijima.name: Makoto Niijima
makotoNiijima.location: Makoto can most often be found during the day in front of the Student Council Office inside your school, or hanging outside the gates. She's available in the daytime on Tuesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday, and is available day and night on rainy days.
makotoNiijima.notes: To impress Makoto with gifts for extra cooperation points, give items like the Mini Cactus, Fountain Pen or Book Cover.

ranks.rankOne:
• After clearing the Bank Palace dungeon in the story, find Makoto in front of the Student Council Office at school. 
  • Rank 3 (Scholarly) Knowledge is required.
  • Unlocks Shadow Calculus ability, allowing you to see the skills and potential drops from enemies on the analyse screen.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "You're very well informed." +2
    • Choice 2: "That was dangerous." +3  /  "You should have known better." +2
    • Choice 3: Any
    • Phone Conversation (P5R): "Absolutely." +1
  • Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Makoto's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You have the wrong idea." +2
    • Choice 2: "You can change." +3  /  "Don't let it get to you." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "We seem to get along." +2
  • Unlocks the Brainiac Talk ability, giving Makoto the chance to step in and rescue a failed demon negotiation.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's unlike you." +2
    • Choice 4: "Why do you use it?" +3  /  "That's adorable." +2
    • Choice 5: "That's an amazing goal." +3  /  "I like a woman in uniform." +2
  • Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Makoto the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "He sounds suspicious." +3  /  "That's annoying." +2
    • Choice 2: "I got this." +3  /  "Only if I can take it seriously." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Convince with all your heart." +2
ranks.rankSix:
• Requires rank 5 (max) charm.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Love comes in many forms." +3  /  "We just started." +2
  • Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Makoto the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 4: "That's a horrible story." +3  /  "He was a noble man." +3  /  "Was it tough without him?" +2
    • Choice 5: All result in +3
    • Choice 6: All result in +2
    • Choice 7: "I'm game if you are." +2 / "Refuse her, please." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Leave it to me." +2
  • Unlocks the Shadow Factorization ability, which tells you if an attack will be effective or not while targeting.
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "He says that to all the girls." +2  /  "That's how he ropes you in." +2
    • Choice 2: "Absolutely." +3  /  "What are you going to do?" +2  /  "Eh, she deserves him." +2
  • Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Makoto a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Makoto Niijima becomes available.
  • In order to start this rank, you'll need information on the host, Tsukasa. Get this by going to Shinjuku - there's a man outside the bookstore. Talk to him twice.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: All result in +3
    • Choice 2: All result in +2
    • Choice 3: "That was the right move." +2
    • Choice 4: "I'm a regular here." +3  /  "It's a popular meeting spot." +3  /  "Not as much as you." +2
    • Choice 5:
      • Friendship - "You'll find someone someday." +3  
      • Romance - "I'll be your study partner."
    • Choice 6:
      • Romance - "I do."  
      • Friendship - "That's not what I meant."
  • Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Makoto the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form, Cybele.

yusukeKitagawa.name: Yusuke Kitagawa
yusukeKitagawa.location: Yusuke is usually found after school in the day in the Shibuya Station Underground Walkway.

ranks.rankOne:
• On 6/18 there will be an umissable event with Yusuke. Talk to him at the train station's underground passageway afterwards.  
  • Unlocks Novice Duplication, a skill that allows Yusuke to produce low-level skill cards for you by using Blank Cards. These can then be used to teach your Persona moves.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "It's novel." +2 / "It's enigmatic." +2
    • Choice 2: "I can't wait." +3 / "I hope you're right." +3
  • Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Yusuke's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Don't let it bother you." +2
    • Choice 3: "This isn't like you." +3 / "You're really giving up?" +2
    • Choice 4: Both give +2
  • Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Yusuke the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up.
  • Unlocks the Ueno Museum location if it wasn't already available.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Why are we in a boat?" +2 / "I should bring a girl here." +2
    • Choice 2: "Love comes in all forms." +3 / "Maybe you should train more." +2
  • Unlocks the Artist Talk ability, giving Yusuke the chance to step in on a failed demon negotiation.
  • Unlocks the Inokashira Park location if it wasn't already available.
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Do you want me to strip?" +3 / "I dunno if I can do it..." +2
    • Choice 2: "I'm sure you will." +3 / "It doesn't look like it." +3 / "Do you want to give up?" +2
  • Unlocks the Adept Duplication skill, which allows Yusuke to create medium-level skill cards on your request with use of a Blank Card.
  • Unlocks the Kanda Church location if it wasn't already available.
ranks.rankSix:
• Requires rank 4 (Masterful) Proficiency.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It feels nostalgic." +2
    • Choice 4: "I couldn't possibly tell you." +3
  • Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Yusuke the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "What do you mean?" +2
    • Choice 2: "The truth is within you." +3
  • Unlocks the Master Duplication ability, which allows Yusuke to create skill cards for high-end skills by using a Blank Card.
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It has to be Ann." +2
    • Choice 2: "You've really grown, Yusuke." +3
  • Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Yusuke a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
ranks.rankNine:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Her love for her son." +3 / "The pain of separation." +3 / "I don't know." +2
    • Choice 2: "You've really changed, Yusuke." +3 / "That's a great idea." +2
  • Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Yusuke the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Makoto's Persona to its final form.

futabaSakura.name: Futaba Sakura
futabaSakura.location: Once you've befriended her Futaba will be found hanging out outside LeBlanc. Futaba is available on Wednesday, Thursday, Saturday and Sunday daytimes. She stays indoors when it rains. A side quest kicked off by the Sojiro Sakura confidant relationship can put a stop to the Futaba relationship progressing any further for a limited time - so keep that in mind.
futabaSakura.notes: If you want to give Futaba a gift to boost your rank further she'll accept things like the Best of KGB49 CD or, if you're in a relationship, the Heart Necklace.

ranks.rankOne:
• On 8/31's nighttime you'll unlock this cooperation through story progression. 
  • Unlocks the Moral Support ability, giving Futaba a chance to cast Kaja or other party-healing magic mid-battle.
  • Unlocks the Akihabara location.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Requires rank 4 (selfless) kindness. The date must also be after 9/2.
  • Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's a great idea." +2
    • Choice 2: "If we work together." +3 / "Want me to help?" +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "I'll be pleased." +2
  • Unlocks the Mementos Scan ability. With this, Futaba has a chance of fully mapping out a floor of Mementos on arrival.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I was about to come find you." +3
    • Choice 2: "Good to see you again." +3 / "You're the one who appeared." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Let's do our best." +2
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Let's do this together." +3 / "Nope." +2
    • Choice 3: "I think it's cute." +3 / "Everyone does it." +2 / "Not at all." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Always willing to help." +2
  • Unlocks the Position Hack skill - with this, Futaba can arrange for you to sometimes open a battle with a hold-up.
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That must have been a shock." +3 / "Are you happy?" +2
    • Choice 2: "I think you're right." +3 / "Your... what?" +2
    • Choice 3: "He's the protagonist." +3 / "What's an NPC?" +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Will you run away again?" +2
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That must have been a shock." +3  /  "Are you happy?" +2
    • Choice 2: "You didn't know any better." +2
  • Unlocks the Active Support ability. With this, Moral Support can sometimes charge and recover SP too.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "What horrible parents." +2 / "We have to put a stop to this." +2
    • Choice 2: "I'll do it, for you." +3 / "We'll show them the truth." +3 / "Give me some time." +2
  • Unlocks the Treasure Reboot ability.
  • Unlocks the Daughter's Just a Meal Ticket sidequest / request for Mementos. This must be completed before the next rank can be started.
ranks.rankEight:
• To initiate, complete the Daughter's Just a Meal Ticket sidequest/request in mementos. 
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's incredible." +3  /  "I'm glad to hear that." +3 / "Did you stutter at all?" +2
    • Choice 2: "You worked really hard, too." +3 / "You're making me blush..." +2
    • Phone Call (P5R): "Congrats." +2 / "Do you want to break your head again?" +2
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Futaba Sakura becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You've really matured." +3 / "What if you get bullied again?" +2
    • Choice 2: "Are you OK, Futaba?" +3 / "You're imagining things." +2
    • Choice 3: "If you want." +2 / "No way." +2
    • Choice 4:
      • Romance - "Because I love you."
      • Friendship - "Because we're teammates."
    • Phone Call (P5R): Romance - "Want me to say it?" +2 / Friendship: Any
  • Unlocks the Emergency Shift ability, giving Futaba the ability to potentially swap out some party members when two or more are KOed.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Final Guard, which has a chance to completely nullify an otherwise fatal attack.
  • Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Futaba's Persona to its final form, Ongyo-Ki.

takutoMaruki.name: Takuto Maruki
takutoMaruki.notes:
• Once unlocked, you’ll be able to see Takuto Maruki on Monday and Friday daytimes. He’s your school councillor, and so he’ll be found in the school building, of course. 
  • The Maruki confidant relationship will kick off on May 13. 
  • You won’t be able to go beyond Rank 5 until after September 19.
  • Finally, you must progress to Rank 9 before November 17 if you want to reach Rank 10. This unlocks the new semester added to P5R, unlocking a lot of new content, but is also key if you want to get the game's true ending.

ranks.rankOne:
• You’ll meet Takuto Maruki through the natural progression of P5R’s story - he’ll show up and meet you to kick off the confidant relationship on 5/13. None of the conversation choices here matter.
  • Unlocks +5 SP, plus an item.

twinWardens.name: Twin Wardens
twinWardens.notes: Rather than simply hanging out with them, the Twin Wardens want you to bring them specific Persona with specific abilities for each rank up. As you level the pair up they unlock more Velvet Room functions for you, useful for getting better Persona for combat - and you'll also over time get to know a little more about this mysterious duo.

ranks.rankOne:
Jack Frost with Mabufu

Here's a few ways to get a Jack Frost with Mabufu in order to achieve Rank 1: 

  • Unlocked automatically on 5/18.
  • For rank 1, the twins want to see a Jack Frost with Mabufu.
    • Jack Frost learns Mabufu at level 12. Jack Frost is a Magician Arcana Persona, and so with the story-driven progression of the Morgana Magician cooperation you'll be able to get enough bonus experience to boost Jack Frost up to level 12 from very early on in the game.
    • In order to fuse Jack Frost, fuse Berith (Hierophant) with Apsaras (Priestess).
    • You can also fuse Mokoi (Death) with Apsaras (Priestess) for the same result. 
    • In Persona 5 Royal, you can also fuse Silky (Priestess) with Berith.
    • These Persona are available in the first palace and in early areas of mementos.
  • Unlocks the Group Guillotine, a new fusing method that lets you fuse three Persona at once.
ranks.rankTwo:
Ame no Uzume with Frei

  • Combine Suzaku (Sun, minimum level 16) with Berith (Hierophant, minimum level 9).
    • Can get Suzaku by fusing Berith and Hua Po
  • Alternatively, fuse Cait Sith (Magician) with Succubus (Moon) and use a Frei Skill Card on the resulting Persona.
ranks.rankThree:
Flauros with Tarukaja

  • To get Flauros with Tarukaja, fuse a Berith (Hierophant), Orobas (Hierophant) and Eligor (Emperor). You'll need Eligor to be level 16 in order for it to have the Tarukaja skill to carry over. You can get Eligor from the Chemdah area in Mementos.
ranks.rankFour:
Phoenix with Counter

  • First, fuse Jack O'Lantern (Magician) with Hua Po (Hanged Man). The result is Yaksini. Now fuse Yaksini (Empress) with Kelpie (Strength) - the result will be a shiny new Phoenix with Counter inherited from Yaksini.
ranks.rankFive:
Setanta with Rakukaja<./strong>

  • To get this, simply fuse Silky (Priestess) with Lamia (Empress). Done.
ranks.rankSix:
Neko Shogun with Dekaja

  • The quickest way we found to get a Neko Shogun with Dekaja was to start out with an Anzu (Hierophant) - this guy learns Dekaja at level 28. Boost there to get the move.
    • You could boost to Anzu by fusing Flauros (Devil) and Sandman (Magician), Principality (Justice) and Oni (Strength) or Naga (Hermit) and Rakshasa (Strength), then getting a level boost from your rank in the Hierophant confidant cooperation with Sojiro. 
  • Your next step is to use Anzu in an advanced fusion - fuse it in a three-way with Kodama (Star) and Sudama (Hermit). Select Dekaja as your inherited ability and this rank is complete.
ranks.rankSeven:
Lachesis with Tetraja

  • To get to the 7th rank Igor's deputies ask for a Lachesis with Tetraja.
    • To fuse this Persona, there are stages:
      • Fuse Lamia (Empress) and Sandman (Magician) to create Principality (Justice) - this Persona has Tetraja naturally.
      • Fuse Principality (Justice) with Yaksini (Empress) in order to make an Ame-no-Uzume (Lovers). Make sure you inherit Tetraja as a skill. Depending on your arcana ranks and registered Personas, you might get Kushinada instead of Ame-no-Uzume, which is OK.
      • Finally, fuse your new Ame-no-Uzume (Lovers) with Isis (Priestess) in order to get your Lachesis. Please don't forget to inherit Tetraja - that'd hurt.
ranks.rankEight:
Hecatoncheires with Masukunda

  • Close to the end, things get harder - Caroline and Justine want to see a Hecatoncheires with Masukunda.
    • To get a Hecatoncheires with Masukunda you'll need to fuse two higher-end Persona. Unicorn (Hierophany) and Lilim (Devil) will give you what you need, with Masukunda an available skill to inherit.
    • You can also fuse Clotho (Fortune) with Red Rider (Tower).
    • Another way to get this Persona is to fuse Clotho (Fortune) with Belphegor (Tower) 
    • Royal: You can get a Masukunda Skill Card pretty easily by taking the Velvet Room twins to the Aquarium, available starting 7/26. Have Yusuke duplicate the card if you don't want to use it up permanently.
  • Unlocks Isolation, a new Velvet Room facility that improves Lockdown.
ranks.rankNine:
Bugs with Samarecarm

  • For rank 9 the twins want to see a Bugs with Samarecarm.
    • First of all, to unlock the capability to fuse Bugs, you need to complete the Mementos Request - The Lovesick Cyberstalking Girl, which is available from 7/10.
    • Bugs requires an advanced fusion of three persona - combine Pixie (Lovers) with Pisaca (Death) and Hariti (Empress).
    • Hariti learns Samarecarm at level 41, so boost to it there (the Empress confidant cooperation with Haru will help here) then inherit it from this fusion. One avenue to get Hariti is to fuse Principality and Neko Shogun.
    • Pisaca can be gotten in the deeper Akzeriyyuth section of Mementos.
ranks.rankTen:
Seth with High Counter

  • Caroline and Justine present their ultimate challenge - the twin jailers want you to bring them a Seth with High Counter.
    • Getting Seth will require multiple steps once again:
      • Gain a Skill Card from the mementos request / sidequest The Killer Who Cleans Up Trash. You'll get this request on 10/14. This skill card lets you teach a Persona high counter, and is the quickest route to this move.
      • Combine Hecatoncheir (Hanged) with Kushinada-Hime (Lovers) to get a Horus (Sun).
      • Combine Isis (Priestess), Thoth (Emperor), Anubis (Judgement) and Horus (Sun) to create Seth.
      • Use the ability card you got from the side quest to teach Seth High Counter and you're done! Have Yusuke duplicate the card first if you want.
  • Royal: Unlocks VIP Treatment, which gives a discount for Special Treatment.

ichikoOhya.location: Ohya is always found at night in the Crossroads Bar in Shinjuku. She's only there at night since the bar isn't open in the day. She's almost always drunk.
ichikoOhya.notes: If you want to impress Ohya with a gift, she likes Cameras and Fans

ranks.rankOne:
• Once you gain access to Shinjuku, visit the Crossroads bar and talk to her. You'll have met her earlier in the story at this point.
  • Unlocks Rumor-filled Scoop, which means Palace Alert levels won't increase so quickly and will decrease a little overnight.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "Mishima might..." +2
    • Choice 3: "It's for the article." +2
  • Bonus: Charm Up
  • Unlocks the Rumor-filled Scoop aility, which reduces the security increases in palaces.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You shouldn't make assumptions." +2
    • Choice 4: "Was she falsely accused?" +2
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: Both worth +2
  • Grants the Shocking Scoop ability, which improves the effect of Rumor-filled scoop.
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 4: "That's unforgivable." +3 / "That sounds like defamation." +2
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "He must not like you." +2
    • Choice 3: "You should trust in her." +2
    • Choice 4: "You're a great journalist." +2 / "That's the spirit." +2
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "Let's think of another way." +3 / "Don't let him provoke you." +3 / "Calm down." +2
    • Choice 3: "You're charming as you are." +3 / "You should work on that." +2
  • Unlocks Outrageous Scoop, improving the effects of Rumor-filled Scoop further still.
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You seem tired." +2
    • After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Fighting for Truth in Journalism.
    • Complete the Fighting for Truth in Journalism sidequest in Mementos, then return to Ichiko to rank up.
  • Bonus: Charm Up
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Ichiko Ohya becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "You're not giving up, are you?" +2
    • Choice 3: "I can't leave you." +3 / "I want to help." +3
    • Choice 5:
      • Romance - "I took it seriously."
      • Friendship - "I didn't take it seriously."
    • Choice 5:
      • Romance - "I love you, Ichiko."
      • Friendship - "I'm just kidding."
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Legendary Scoop, eliminating Palace security level increases.

shinyaOda.name: Shinya Oda
shinyaOda.location: Shinya can be found hanging out around the Shibuya Arcade in the afternoon once school is over.

ranks.rankOne:
• On 9/4 Mishima will text you details about a new side quest, Winners Don't Use Cheats. Pursue this sidequest - through the course of the sidequest you will meet Shinya, the Tower Arcana cooperation.
  • Unlocks Down Shot, an ability that lets you spend an entire magazine to guarantee a knock down on an enemy.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "Don't compare me to you." +3 / "Sorry." +2
    • Choice 2: "What a rude employee." +2
    • Choice 3: "Do you admire them?" +2
    • Choice 4: "So do I." +3 / "I'll let them know." +3
  • Unlocks Bullet Hail, which gives you a chance to enter a gun all-out-attack after an ambush.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankThree:
• Get food with Shinya. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "That's the spirit." +2
  • Unlocks Warning Shot, a way to frighten enemies with a threat during demon negotiations to get them to your side.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Dr. Takemi will help." +2
    • Choice 2: "You seem happy." +3 / "You're so kind." +2 / "Why free?" +2
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Yeah, you tell him!" +2
    • Choice 2: "Get your revenge." +2
  • Unlocks Ammo Pouch, boosting your maximum bullet capacity for each weapon.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: "I believe in you." +3 / "That's good." +2
    • Choice 4: "Not at all." +3
  • Unlocks Cheap Shot, reducing the bullets required for a Down Shot.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • None! That was easy.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "No, she's not." +2 / "Is that what you think?" +2
    • Choice 2: "I believe in them" +3 / "It'll all work out." +2
    • After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: A Mother's Aggression.
  • Unlocks Electric Slug, boosting the damage inflicted by Bullet Hail.
  • Bonus: Kindness Up
ranks.rankNine:
• To initiate this rank you must have completed the A Mother's Aggression side quest.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I'm glad to hear that." +3 / "Thank the Phantom Thieves." +2
    • Choice 2: "It means you've matured." +3 / "No, that makes sense." +3 / "A little bit, yeah." +2
    • Choice 3: "He wants to win at all costs."
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Oda Special, allowing Joker's attacks to ignore resistances to hit resistant enemies.

sojiroSakura.name: Sojiro Sakura
sojiroSakura.location: Sojiro Sakura is found in LeBlanc Cafe, your home, at night.

ranks.rankOne: • As the story progresses, you'll unlock the ability to befriend Sojiro.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Making coffee." +2
    • Choice 2: "That guy seemed suspicious." +2
    • Choice 3: "I want the ladies to love me." +2
  • Unlocks Coffee Basics, a new ability that lets you create a coffee item that can restore SP in battle using LeBlanc's coffee brewing facilities.
  • Kindness +3.
ranks.rankThree:
• Before you start this rank, you'll have to make coffee once. After that, you can spend time with Sojiro again on a subsequent night.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Medium-fine." +2
    • Choice 3: "Is it trouble?" +2
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Tell me more." +3
    • Choice 2: "Call Sojiro's phone." +3
  • Unlocks the Leblanc Curry ability - this skill lets ytou create a curry item that can restore SP using LeBlanc's kitchen.
  • Kindness +3
ranks.rankFive:
• Available only after 8/22.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I think I'm addicted!" +3 / "It wasn't bad." +2
    • Choice 2: "She wasn't normal, huh?" +3 / "She was like Futaba?" +2
    • Choice 3: "It really paid off in the end." +2
  • Kindness +3
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "To each his own." +2
    • Choice 2: "Shut your mouth." +3 / "You're wrong." +2
    • Choice 3: "Saving Futaba was no mistake." +2
  • Unlocks the Coffee Mastery ability, enhancing your coffee-making ability to allow for better items.
  • Kindness +3
ranks.rankSeven:
• Requires rank 5 (angelic) kindness.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You might be right." +2
  • Kindness +3
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Something with curry." +3 / "You want my suggestion?" +2
    • Choice 2: "I was just protecting Futaba." +2
  • Unlocks the Mementos Mission Request: "The Money-Grubbing Uncle". Futaba and Sojiro Cooperations will be locked until this is complete.
ranks.rankNine:
• You must complete "The Money-Grubbing Uncle" sidequest in order to start this rank.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It's great." +3 / "It's a bit of a nag." +2
    • Choice 2: "You have a great daughter." +3 / "Congrats." +3
  • Unlocks the Curry Tips skill, which enhances the quality of the curry you can make.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks the Kanda Church location if it isn't unlocked by this point. 
  • Unlocks Curry Mastery, making the curry you make fantastic at restoring your whole party's SP.

hifumiTogo.name: Hifumi Togo
hifumiTogo.location: Hifumi Togo is found in the church at Kanda, and an in-game event will point you her way, though going there is optional. She's there at night.
hifumiTogo.notes: If you want to give Hifumi a gift, some good initial ideas are a fountain pen, book cover or fan.

ranks.rankOne:
• You'll need to have completed the Kaneshiro's Bank heist. 
  • After 6/25, visit Kanda Church and talk to the girl towards the front. To start the cooperation you'll need at least rank 3 (suave) charm, otherwise she'll just ignore you.
  • Unlocks Koma Sabaki, which lets you swap out party members on the fly mid-battle whenever it's Joker's turn.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's interesting." +2
    • Choice 3: "But you don't want to, right?" +2
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
ranks.rankThree: <ul>\t<li>Impactful conversation choices for this rank:\t<ul>\t\t<li>Choice 1: \"Describes you perfectly.\" +2<\/li>\t\t<li>Choice 2: \"Having a difficult time?\" +2<\/li>\t<\/ul>\t<\/li>\t<li>Unlocks <strong>Uchikomi<\/strong>, giving your non-present allies a chance to drop in for an extra attack after an enemy is downed.<\/li>\t<li>Bonus: Knowledge Up<\/li><\/ul>
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I didn't mind." +2 / "Must've been the katsu curry." +2
    • Choice 2: "They're cool." +2
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
  • Unlocks the Book Town location.
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "She's scary." +2
    • Choice 2: "You should stop then." +2
  • Unlocks Kakoi Kuzushi, which allows you to attempt to escape from battle even when enemies have you surrounded.
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Is that frustrating?" +2
    • Choice 2: "Do what you love." +2 / "Do you still like shogi?" +2
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
  • Unlocks the Sky Tower Location if you've never visited it before.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "It may all come down to luck." +3 / "That's almost a relief." +2
    • Choice 2: "I believe in you." +3 / "Give it your all." +2
  • Unlocks Narikin, a chance to get double money if you win the battle in one full party turn after an ambush.
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
ranks.rankEight:
• Requires rank 5 (erudite) knowledge.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "That won't work." +2
    • After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Upstaging the Stage Mother.
  • Complete the Upstaging the Stage Mother sidequest, then return to Hifumi:
    • Choice 1: "I'm glad her heart changed." +3 / "Maybe..." +2
  • Bonus: Knowledge Up
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Hifumi Togo becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Before the Rank: "Give it all you got." +2
    • Choice 1: "A very queenly decision." +3
    • Choice 2:
      • Romance - "I want to stay by your side."
      • Friendship - "I want to become stronger."
    • Choice 3:
      • Romance - "I want us to date."
      • Friendship - "We'll be friends forever."
  • Unlocks Touryou, removing the need to wait before you can escape from battle.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Togo System, allowing you to switch in and out party members during any party member's turn.

toranosukeYoshida.name: Toranosuke Yoshida
toranosukeYoshida.location: Politician Yoshida can be found hanging out in Shibyua Station Square at night.
toranosukeYoshida.notes: As a warning, plot reasons mean this confidant ceases to be available after November 13, so you'll need to rush to max it out.

ranks.rankOne:
• This cooperation can be picked up from 5/6 onwards, but is entirely optional and easy to miss for months.
  • Yoshida can be found in Station Square, but if you listen to his political preaching you'll learn that he frequents a nearby Beef Bowl Shop.
  • You can apply to work there via the leaflets in the train station. Work there twice and you'll meet Yoshida, starting off this confidant cooperation.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "I want to improve my speech." +2
    • Choice 2: "One with conviction." +2 / "I don't know yet." +2
    • Choice 3: "That was helpful." +2
  • Unlocks Diplomacy, a useful ability that lets you get more money or items from demon negotiation.
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "His message." +2 / "His speaking skills." +2
  • Unlocks Fundraising, which allows you to demand a lot more money during demon negotiation.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 4: "I couldn't help myself." +2
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That media doesn't matter." +3 / "I think so." +2
  • Unlocks Manipulation, a skill that raises the chance enemies will give up rare items.
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I don't really care." +3 / "I'm for them." +2
    • Choice 2: "I'd decline." +3 / "I'd leave it to chance." +2
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You should decline." +2
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's a difficult decision." +2
    • Choice 3: "Stick to your beliefs." +3
  • Unlocks Mind Control, an ability that sometimes lets you skip demon negotiation entirely.
ranks.rankNine:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Do your best." +3 / "I'm getting nervous." +2
    • Choice 2: "You had a change of heart." +2
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Charismatic Speech, allowing for contracts to be forged with higher-level Persona more easily.

chihayaMifune.name: Chihaya Mifune
chihayaMifune.location: Chihaya is always found in Shinjuku at night, but it can't be raining. She'll be at her stall.
chihayaMifune.notes: If you want to give Chihaya a gift, she likes the Star-shaped hand mirror, the Flower Basket and Sponge Cake.

ranks.rankOne:
• From 6/22 on, you can interact with Chihaya in  Shibuya. Her booth is located down the side street at night. Getting this cooperation started has a few steps:
    • Talk to her and ask for a prediction. This scene triggers an event back home.
    • Go back to speak to her another day and purchase the Holy Stone for ¥100,000 Yen. (Yes, that much.) This triggers another event once you get home.
    • Go see Chihaya a third time about the Holy Stone. You'll get a mission for mementos: Ending the Boyfriend's Abuse.
    • Complete the Ending the Boyfriend's Abuse mission in Mementos, then go back to see Chihaya. This triggers rank 1 of this confidant relationship.
  • Unlocks Luck Reading, where a sitting with Chihaya temporarily boosts gains to one social stat.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "Encourage her."
    • Choice 2: "Overturn your fate."
    • Choice 3: "Open your mind to change." +2
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Follow his heart."
    • Choice 2: "Thieves may steal her away."
  • Unlocks Money Reading allowing Chihaya to boost money gains in battle temporarily after a reading.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "Trust in yourself." +3 / "Strengthen your will."
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You're such a hard worker." +3 / "You must have a lot of free time." +2
  • Unlocks Fate Reading, which reveals upcoming abilities for confidants... not that you need that with this guide!
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 4: "You're just Chihaya to me." +3
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I don't think so." +3 / "You shouldn't have tricked them." +2
  • Unlocks the Affinity Reading ability, which boosts your relationship with a chosen confidant.
ranks.rankEight:
• Rank 8 comes in two parts. For the first part, say whatever you want. This will give you a mementos sidequest/mission: Debunking the Psychic.
  • Once you've completed the Debunking the Psychic request in Mementos, return to Chihaya for more meaningful conversation.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I know." +3  /  "I had no idea." +2
    • Choice 2: All give +3
    • Choice 4: "Hell yeah, I am." +3
ranks.rankNine:
• This is the point when a romance with Chihaya Hifune becomes available.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "Well, fate can be changed." +3 / "That's all in the past now." +2
    • Choice 4:
      • Romance - "So I can be with you."
      • Friendship - "I like having my fortune read."
  • Returns the ¥100,000 Yen spent to start this cooperation to you.
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Special Fate Reading, which previews all of the abilities that can be unlocked for any confidant you choose.

iwaiMunehisa.name: Iwai Munehisa
iwaiMunehisa.location: Iwai's cooperation is always advanced by visiting him in his shop at night. He's in his shop at day, but won't entertain advancing your friendship then.

ranks.rankOne:
• After 5/6 and once you see the event in the airsoft shop with the 'package' you have to hold, talk to Iwai with rank 4 (dauntless) guts to start this cooperation.
  • Unlocks Starter Customization, allowing you to tweak your guns for battle.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • Choice 1: "That's probably the signal." to call him.
    • Choice 3: "How's your cold?" +2 / "What should I do now?" +2
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankThree:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "I always knew you were a thug." +3 / "Y-Yakuza?!" +2
    • Choice 3: "We made a deal, didn't we?" +3
  • Unlocks Medium Customization of your firearms.
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 4: "Where's my reward?" +3 / "You two should play nice." +2
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 2: "You're pathetic." +3
    • Choice 3: "That's right." +3 / "I'll stick around for the guns." +3
  • Unlocks a Discount for gun customization.
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 3: "Girls." +3 / "That's a secret." +3 / "Our futures." +2
    • Choice 4: "You should buy is something." +3 / "Right." +2
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Absolutely." +3 / "I guess he likes guns." +2
    • Choice 2: "He's clever." +3 / "What a crafty bastard." +2
  • Unlocks Advanced Customization for your guns.
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankEight:
• Requires rank 5 guts.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I did it all for Iwai." +3 / "It most definitely was." +2
    • Choice 2: "I will." +2 / "I want to help." +2
    • After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked, Shady Deal in the Shadows.
  • Complete the quest, then return to Iwai.
    • Choice 1: "I dunno." +2
    • Choice 2: "I guess I could consider it." +3 / "If you pay me well." +3 / "I'm back, baby." +2
  • Bonus: Proficency Up
ranks.rankNine:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Are you sure he's alive?" +3 / "That's great news." +2
    • Choice 5: "Tell him the truth." +3 / "You need to trust your son." +3
    • Choice 6: "He's a cool kid, huh?" +3 / "Karou is really strong willed." +3 / "He gets that maturity from you." +2
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Special Customization, the maximum type of gun type weapon customization.
  • Bonus: Proficency Up

yuukiMishima.name: Yuuki Mishima
yuukiMishima.location: Mishima can be found in Shibuya or in Shinjuku, most often at night.
yuukiMishima.notes: While Mishima's confidant cooperation is linked to side quests, the standard rules apply for the questions you can answer in conversation - some are worth more points to advance the relationship than others, and there is a point bonus if you have a Moon Persona in your stock to match his Arcana. All the point additions listed here are when you have a Moon Persona equipped.

ranks.rankOne:
• This cooperation kicks off on 5/6 automatically as part of the main story.
  • Unlocks Mishima's Support, a very useful side ability that allows back-up party members to still earn a little EXP, albeit at a reduced rate.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Automatically triggered as a story progression moment on 5/8.
  • Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:
    • None! Take it easy.
ranks.rankThree:
• Available from 5/10.
  • Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Great idea." +3 / "I'm already taken." +2
    • Choice 2: "We're part of... the Phandom?" +2 / "Let's tell the truth." +2
    • Choice 3: "It's not your fault." +2
  • Unlocks Mishima's Enthusiasm, increasing the EXP earned from battles.
ranks.rankFour:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Steak sounds good." +3 / "I love desserts." +2
    • Choice 2: "You're amazing." +2
ranks.rankFive:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Is it for me?" +3 / "Why was it so expensive?" +2
    • Choice 2: "That's a good idea." +2
  • Unlocks Mishima's Desperation, which boosts the EXP back-up party members receive from Mishima's Support.
ranks.rankSix:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "Just tell me already." +2 / "You sure are fired up..." +2
    • Choice 2: "Rumors are wrong all the time..." +2 / "It's none of our business." +2
    • Choice 4: "Absolutely. Nice job." +2
  • Unlocks the Inokashira Park location if you haven't already got it.
ranks.rankSeven:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You're so reliable." +3 / "And what exactly will we win?" +2
    • Choice 2: "Sounds pretty twisted." +2 / "You need to chill." +2
  • Once this is done, meet with your team and then go into mementos and find the target. Talk to them. Later, Mishima will get in touch to talk:
    • Choice 3: "Maybe the Phansite?" +3 / "I'm sure there is." +2
  • Unlocks Phanboy, drastically increasing the EXP you gain from battle.
ranks.rankEight:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "I'm not leaving." +3 / "You should run too." +2
    • Choice 3: "Wait, that was all an act?" +3 / "You were super cool." +3 / "Totally." +2
ranks.rankNine:
• Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
    • Choice 1: "You showed some real courage." +3 / "I'm glad you're still alive." +2
ranks.rankTen:
• Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.
  • Unlocks Salvation Wish, allowing back-up party members to gain full EXP from battles.

ranks.rankOne:
• Automatically on 4/12.
  • Unlocks Wild Talk ability, allowing for negotiation with Shadows during a Hold Up.
  • Unlocks Arcana Burst, gifting Bonus EXP to Persona of this Arcana based on this Confidant's rank.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Automatically after you infiltrate the first palace.
  • Unlocks Third Eye ability, letting you see things more clearly with L1/L2.
ranks.rankThree:
• Automatically on 5/5.
  • Unlocks Power Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 8.
ranks.rankFour: • After the second palace
ranks.rankFive:
• Automatically on 6/11.
  • Unlocks Super Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 10.
ranks.rankSix:
• After the fourth palace.
  • Unlocks High Arcana Burst ability, granting further bonus EXP based on Confidant rank.
ranks.rankSeven: • Automatically on 8/22.
ranks.rankEight:
• Automatically on 8/31.
  • Unlocks the Ultra Stock ability, increasing your Persona stock to 12.
ranks.rankNine: • Automatically on 10/11.
ranks.rankTen:
• Automatically on 12/24.
  • Unlocks the Max Arcana Burst, greatly raising bonus EXP for Fool Persona fusion.

ranks.rankOne:
• Automatically on 4/15.
  • Unlocks Infiltration Tools ability, allowing you to spend time in your room crafting infiltration tools like lockpicks.
ranks.rankTwo:
• Automatically after you steal your first treasure.
  • Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Morgana's turn to other Baton Pass users after a 1 More.
ranks.rankThree:
• Automatically after you raid your second palace.
  • Unlocks the Follow Up ability, where Morgana has a chance to perform a follow-up attack after Joker.
